EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_ Spring Integration Done Boot-ifully 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Integration Done Boot-ifully
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Integration Done Boot-ifully with Glenn Renfro, Pivotal. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, June 17, 2014 {{my.My Token:default=edit me}}
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=665008202>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 665 008 202
Thank you,
